item.title: RFK Jr. Says He’s Ending the War on Protein. It Doesn’t Exist
item.description: There is no war on protein. But pretending there is goes hand-in-hand with the Trump administration’s appeal to traditional masculinity.

item.title: Anthropic taps former Microsoft India MD to lead Bengaluru expansion
item.description: Irina Ghose joins Anthropic as India managing director after 24 years at Microsoft.

item.title: 20% Off Brooks Promo Code & Deals for January 2026
item.description: Enjoy 20% off your first order with a Brooks coupon code, plus top discounts and deals on our favorite Brooks running shoes.

item.title: 30% VistaPrint Coupon & Promo Codes | January 2026
item.description: From personalized gifts to business essentials, WIRED can help you save with our selection of VistaPrint promo codes.

item.title: Silicon Valley’s messiest breakup is definitely headed to court
item.description: OpenAI and Microsoft tried to dodge a courtroom showdown with Elon Musk, but a federal judge on Thursday rejected their requests to dismiss the case.
